goal.ch: 介紹大氣化學本質、理論、實驗、應用，以及其與大氣物理間之關係，進而探討大氣環境之變化。
goal.en:
Its purpose is to give a comprehensive understanding of the interactions between chemical and atmospheric processes rather than to introduce complicated chemical mechanisms. This course is provided to broaden the students‘ scope in the field of meteorology and give them an understanding of the current environmental problems the globe is concerned with.

     This course will focus on the chemical and physical processes of natural and anthropogenic products that interact with the atmosphere. Practical issues, including acid rain, urban air pollution (e.g., photochemical smog), stratospheric ozone depletion, and global change, will be discussed. The kinetic treatment of gaseous and aqueous chemistry will be introduced. Aerosol chemistry will also be included. The modeling of atmospheric chemistry and its linkage with atmospheric processes will be discussed.

outline.ch:
1. 簡介 - 化學與地球
2.大氣——大氣物理學回顧
3.化學動力學背景回顧
4.大氣輻射
5.平流層化學-臭氧化學
6.對流層化學-污染化學
7.水化學-SO2化學酸雨的形成與酸沉降
8. 大氣氣膠 - 氣溶膠化學和物理
9. 有害大氣污染物
10.大氣化學模擬
11. 實驗室參觀與實驗
outline.en:
1. Introduction - Chemistry and the Earth
2. The Atmosphere - Review of atmospheric physics
3. Background review of chemical kinetics
4. Atmospheric radiation
5. Stratospheric Chemistry - Ozone chemistry
6. Tropospheric Chemistry - Pollution chemistry
7. Aqueous Chemistry – SO2 chemistryFormation of acid rain and acidic deposition
8. Atmospheric Aerosol - Aerosol chemistry and physics
9. Hazardous Atmospheric Pollutants
10. Atmospheric Chemistry Modeling
11. Laboratory tours and Experiments

Chemistry of Atmospheres, R. P. Wayne, 3rd Ed. 2016 (2nd Ed. 2006)

Chemistry of the Upper and Lower Atmosphere: Theory, Experiments, and Applications, B. J. Finlayson-Pitts and J. N. Pitts, Jr., 2000
 Air Pollution and Global Warming, Mark Z. Jacobson 2012.
